doc.after: Scientology is a body of beliefs and related practices created by Speculative Fiction author L Ron Hubbard 1911 1986 starting in 1952 as a successor to his earlier self help system Dianetics Hubbard characterized Scientology as a religion and in 1953 incorporated the Church of Scientology in Camden New Jersey
